meanings.definition: Not mixed or diluted with any different or extra elements; complete and absolute.
meanings.sent1: The unadulterated milk was fresh and pure.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the unadulterated beauty of the untouched forest.
meanings.sent3: The unadulterated joy on the child's face was contagious.
meanings.sent4: His unadulterated honesty was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The unadulterated truth finally came to light.

meanings.sent1: The unadulterated gold gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her unadulterated kindness touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent3: The unadulterated laughter of the baby filled the room.
meanings.sent4: His unadulterated love for music was evident in every note.
meanings.sent5: The unadulterated joy of the moment was unforgettable.
